it.unipr.ce.dsg.s2p.message.parser
Class BasicParser

java.lang.Object
  it.unipr.ce.dsg.s2p.message.parser.BasicParser
Direct Known Subclasses:
JSONParser
public abstract class BasicParser
extends java.lang.Object

The BasicParser is an abstract class to marshal and unmarshal the messages of the peer with a data-interchange format (es. JSON, XML).

All class that extends BasicParser should implement a content type. For example in JSON format will be MSG_JSON="application/json"

Author:
Fabrizio Caramia
